about_the_game:
Secret Paws - Cozy Apartments is a 3D hidden objects game where your mission is to find over 1000 cats hidden in cozy and cluttered apartments.

Open drawers, safes, cabinets, and move objects to uncover the most unexpected hiding spots. Every corner of the apartment holds surprises and challenges as you explore a richly detailed isometric environment.

With secret cats and intriguing puzzles to unlock new rooms and areas, "Secret Paws - Cozy Apartments" is perfect for cat lovers and exploration challenge enthusiasts.

Are you ready to prove yourself as the ultimate cat finder?

Features

  • Innovative 3D hidden objects: One of the few games that combines classic exploration mechanics with a 3D isometric environment. 🚀

  • Over 1000 hidden cats: Find cats of all colors, sizes, and personalities. 😻

  • Challenges to unlock new rooms: Solve puzzles and collect items to explore more areas. 🔑

  • Secret cats: Discover special felines in unique hiding spots. 💎

  • Detailed interactivity: Open furniture, move objects, and interact with the environment. ⚠️

  • Hint System: Use hints to highlight a random cat when you're having trouble. 🔍

Find all the cats and become the best cat finder in Secret Paws - Cozy Apartments!

✅ Please add Secret Paws - Cozy Apartments to your Steam Wishlist! ✅

  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11.0c

  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad-Core
